SELECT b.Bidx ,b.Title ,b.Uidx ,b.Contents ,b.Hit ,b.Wdate ,u.nickname ,b.board_type ,b.isDel ,b.Image1 FROM Board b INNER JOIN AnnaUser u ON b.uidx = u.uidx WHERE b.isDel ='N'
AND b.Contents like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%') OR u.nickname like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%') OR b.Title like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%')
AND b.Title like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%')
AND b.Contents like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%') OR u.nickname like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%')
ORDER BY b.Wdate desc limit #{startPage}, #{pageNum}

SELECT COUNT(Bidx) FROM Board b INNER JOIN AnnaUser u ON b.uidx = u.uidx WHERE b.isDel = 'N'
AND b.Contents like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%') OR u.nickname like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%') OR b.Title like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%')
AND b.Title like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%')
AND b.Contents like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%') OR u.nickname like concat('%',#{SearchVal},'%')
SELECT b.Title ,b.Contents ,b.Wdate ,b.Bidx ,b.uidx ,u.nickname ,b.Image1 ,b.Image2 ,b.Image3 ,b.Image4 ,b.Image5 FROM Board b, AnnaUser u WHERE b.Uidx = u.uidx AND b.Bidx = #{Bidx}
SELECT COUNT( contents ) FROM reply WHERE Bidx = #{Bidx} AND isDel = 'N'

SELECT r.Uidx as Uidx ,r.Bidx as Bidx ,u.nickName as nickName ,r.contents as contents ,r.Wdate as Wdate ,r.isDel as isDel FROM reply r, AnnaUser u WHERE r.Bidx = #{Bidx} AND r.isDel = 'N' AND r.Uidx = u.uidx
